title: Thermal to visible face recognition using deep autoencoders
venue: 2019 International Conference of the Biometrics Special Interest Group (BIOSIG)
citation: A. Kantarcı and H. K. Ekenel, "Thermal to Visible Face Recognition Using Deep Autoencoders," 2019 International Conference of the Biometrics Special Interest Group (BIOSIG), Darmstadt, Germany, 2019, pp. 1-5.

title: Blockchain-based electronic voting system for elections in Turkey
venue: 2019 4th International Conference on Computer Science and Engineering (UBMK)

title: Offline Signature Verification on Real-World Documents
venue: Proceedings of the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition Workshops
excerpt: A realistic signature verification dataset and a novel method to separate signatures from background. [Code]( https://github.com/Alpkant/Offline-Signature-Verification-on-Real- World-Documents)
citation: Deniz Engin, Alperen Kantarci, Secil Arslan, Hazim Kemel Ekenel; Proceedings of the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR) Workshops, 2020, pp. 808-809

title: Deep Learning Based, Real-Time Object Detection for Autonomous Driving
venue: 2020 28th Signal Processing and Communications Applications Conference (SIU)
citation: G. Akyol, A. Kantarcı, A. E. Çelik and A. Cihan Ak, "Deep Learning Based, Real-Time Object Detection for Autonomous Driving," 2020 28th Signal Processing and Communications Applications Conference (SIU), Gaziantep, Turkey, 2020, pp. 1-4, doi: 10.1109/SIU49456.2020.9302500.

title: Face liveness detection competition (livdet-face)-2021
venue: 2021 IEEE International Joint Conference on Biometrics (IJCB)
excerpt: Overview of the face liviness detection competition that we have participated.
citation: S. Purnapatra et al., "Face Liveness Detection Competition (LivDet-Face) - 2021," 2021 IEEE International Joint Conference on Biometrics (IJCB), Shenzhen, China, 2021, pp. 1-10, doi: 10.1109/IJCB52358.2021.9484359.

title: Shuffled patch-wise supervision for presentation attack detection
venue: 2021 International Conference of the Biometrics Special Interest Group (BIOSIG)
excerpt: Oral presentation. We propose a novel training augmentation for face presentation attack detection methods. Our method improves the generalization of a given neural network based face liveness detection network.
citation: A. Kantarcı, H. Dertli and H. K. Ekenel, "Shuffled Patch-Wise Supervision for Presentation Attack Detection," 2021 International Conference of the Biometrics Special Interest Group (BIOSIG), Darmstadt, Germany, 2021, pp. 1-5, doi: 10.1109/BIOSIG52210.2021.9548317.

title: MOCCA: Multilayer one-class classification for anomaly detection
venue: IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems
excerpt: We propose a novel framework, named multilayer one-class classification (MOCCA), to train and test deep learning models on the anomaly detection task. [Code](https://github.com/fvmassoli/mocca-anomaly-detection)
citation: F. V. Massoli, F. Falchi, A. Kantarci, Ş. Akti, H. K. Ekenel and G. Amato, "MOCCA: Multilayer One-Class Classification for Anomaly Detection," in IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems, vol. 33, no. 6, pp. 2313-2323, June 2022, doi: 10.1109/TNNLS.2021.3130074.

title: Automatic Component Counting on P&ID Drawings
venue: 2022 30th Signal Processing and Communications Applications Conference (SIU)
excerpt: We propose a system that can process digital P&ID documents.
citation: Ş. Aktı, A. Kantarcı, M. E. Erakın, F. Cinik, T. Timirci and H. K. Ekenel, "Automatic Component Counting on P&ID Drawings," 2022 30th Signal Processing and Communications Applications Conference (SIU), Safranbolu, Turkey, 2022, pp. 1-4, doi: 10.1109/SIU55565.2022.9864931.

title: Deep patch-wise supervision for presentation attack detection
excerpt: We propose a novel training augmentation for face presentation attack detection methods. Our method improves the generalization of a given neural network based face liveness detection network.
citation: Kantarcı, A., Dertli, H., Ekenel, H.K.: Deep patch-wise supervision for presentation attack detection. IET Biometrics 11(5), 396–406 (2022). https://doi.org/10.1049/bme2.12091

title: Bias-Aware Face Mask Detection Dataset
excerpt: We present a novel face mask detection dataset that contains images posted on Twitter during the pandemic from around the world. [Dataset acquisition](https://github.com/Alpkant/BAFMD)
citation: Kantarcı, A., Ofli, F., Imran, M., & Ekenel, H. K. (2022). Bias-Aware Face Mask Detection Dataset. arXiv preprint arXiv:2211.01207.

title: A survey on computer vision based human analysis in the COVID-19 era
excerpt: The goal of this survey is to provide an introduction to the problems induced by COVID-19 into such research and to present a comprehensive review of the work done in the computer vision based human analysis field. Particular attention is paid to the impact of facial masks on the performance of various methods and recent solutions to mitigate this problem.
citation: Eyiokur, F. I., Kantarcı, A., Erakın, M. E., Damer, N., Ofli, F., Imran, M., ... & Ekenel, H. K. (2022). A survey on computer vision based human analysis in the COVID-19 era. Image and Vision Computing, 104610.

title: Face-Dubbing++: Lip-synchronous, voice preserving translation of videos
venue: 2023 IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech, and Signal Processing Workshops (ICASSPW)
excerpt: In this paper, we propose a neural end-to-end system for voice preserving and lip-synchronous video translation. The system is designed to combine multiple component models and produces a video of the original speaker speaking in the target language that is lip-synchronous with the target speech, yet maintains emphases in speech, voice characteristics, and face video of the original speaker. The result is a video of a speaker speaking in another language without actually knowing it.
citation: A. Waibel et al., "Face-Dubbing++: LIP-Synchronous, Voice Preserving Translation Of Videos," 2023 IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech, and Signal Processing Workshops (ICASSPW), Rhodes Island, Greece, 2023, pp. 1-5, doi: 10.1109/ICASSPW59220.2023.10193719.
